img_summary: The image depicts a stone bowl containing three textured seeds, likely representing an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, the seeds are part of a collection of medicinal or crafting ingredients, categorized by rarity and source. This specific image is positioned among descriptions of seeds like Fire Bellflower Seeds and Golden Lotus Seeds, suggesting it portrays another collectible seed type used for gameplay purposes such as crafting or progression.
